source_text: At each stage, LGM has the option to contribute or dilute, and if LGM's dilute interest drops below 10%, it will convert to a 2% gold Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or a 1.2% NSR if base metal dominant.
additional_details: Royalty is for gold production. It is received by LGM (Legacy Minerals Ltd) if their interest in the joint venture drops below 10%.
